Question: Guangzhou Sanxing Technology co., ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Guangzhou Sanxing Technology Co., Ltd

Mouse Pad Products

- Main products: silicone mouse pads, memory foam mouse pads, rubber flat pads
- Business scope: wholesale, processing, and customization of mouse pad products, wholesale of yoga products
- Location: Building 1, No. 6, Yulingshan 2nd Road, Xintang Town, Zengcheng District, Guangzhou, Guangdong
- Service concept: scientific and technological innovation, win-win cooperation, integrity and efficiency, and first-class service
- Company goal: to become the leading professional mouse pad factory in Guangzhou area
- Emphasis on high technology and brand building
- Commitment to serving entrepreneurs with enthusiasm and providing business opportunities
- Focus on environmentally friendly, healthy, and ergonomically designed products
Summary_cn:
广州三星科技有限公司

鼠标垫产品

- 主要产品：硅胶鼠标垫、记忆棉鼠标垫、橡胶平垫
- 业务范围：鼠标垫产品的批发、加工和定制，瑜伽产品的批发
- 地址：广东省广州市增城区新塘镇玉龙山二路6号1栋
- 服务理念：科技创新，合作共赢，诚信高效，一流服务
- 公司目标：成为广州地区领先的专业鼠标垫工厂
- 重视高科技和品牌建设
- 承诺以热情为企业家服务，提供商机
- 关注环保、健康和人体工程学设计的产品
